author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE RACING EASTWARD ACROSS THE SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS WHEN IT PASSES NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES LATE THURSDAY OR EARLY FRIDAY...
summary: ...GABRIELLE RACING EASTWARD ACROSS THE SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS WHEN IT PASSES NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES LATE THURSDAY OR EARLY FRIDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Wed Sep 24 the center of Gabrielle was located near 36.0, -45.2 with movement E at 28 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE RACING EASTWARD ACROSS THE SUBTROPICAL ATLANTIC... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS WHEN IT PASSES NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES LATE THURSDAY OR EARLY FRIDAY... As of 5:00 PM AST Wed Sep 24 the center of Gabrielle was located near 36.0, -45.2 with movement E at 28 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 100 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
